repos.name: Leetcode-Solutions
repos.description: A repository containing solutions of the Leetcode problems solved by me.

repos.name: ReddiScope
repos.description: An intelligent tool for generating structured user personas from public Reddit profiles.   It uses the Reddit API to collect behavioral data and Cohere’s LLMs to analyze tone, interests, and personality traits. Ideal for showcasing applied NLP, persona modeling, and AI-driven user insights in real-world scenarios.

repos.name: SpendWise
repos.description: SpendWise is a modern full-stack Expense Tracker app to help users manage and visualize their income and expenses. Built with React (Vite) for a fast and responsive frontend, Node.js and Express for the backend, and MongoDB for secure data storage. Includes user authentication, charts, recent transactions, and Excel export support.

repos.name: Web-Development
repos.description: A collection of all the web dev mini projects created by me.
